message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll find valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm excited about the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9500?

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob, but I'm trying to find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to stay close to my minimum price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9000?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more significant concession, but I need to stay above my minimum price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10500. This is my final concession, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
I understand that you've made a significant concession, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $9500. Will you accept?

I'm not willing to go any lower than my minimum price, Bob. I've made significant concessions already, and I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000. This is my absolute final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
